thread.title: WellCare to Award $10,000 in Micro-Grants to Support Social Service Agencies in Nebraska
thread.title_full: WellCare to Award $10,000 in Micro-Grants to Support Social Service Agencies in Nebraska - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: WellCare to Award $10,000 in Micro-Grants to Support Social Service Agencies in Nebraska
text:
WellCare Health Plans, Inc.
TAMPA, Fla. , Oct. 15, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- WellCare Health Plans, Inc. (NYSE: WCG) announced today that it will offer $10,000 in micro-grants to support Nebraska social service organizations that address needs related to homelessness, mental health, transportation and youth services.
Nonprofit and 501(c)(3) organizations that offer services in these areas are encouraged to apply. The micro-grants will be awarded in denominations of $500, $1,000 and $1,500.
"WellCare is acutely aware of the important role the social safety net plays in ensuring and improving community health," said Pamme Lyons-Taylor , vice president of advocacy and community-based programming for WellCare. "We know that people cannot prioritize their health when their basic needs for food, shelter, clothing and safety are not being properly met. We have an opportunity to help people lead better, healthier lives by simply supporting organizations that help people address these needs."
Qualifying organizations can apply by completing a short application online at http://www.thecommunitycommitment.org/micro-grant-request-submission/ . The application period is open until Nov. 16 . Awardees will be notified in December. For more information about micro-grants, call (813) 206-4627.
About WellCare Health Plans, Inc.
Headquartered in Tampa, Fla. , WellCare Health Plans, Inc. (NYSE: WCG) focuses exclusively on providing government-sponsored managed care services, primarily through Medicaid, Medicare Advantage and Medicare Prescription Drug Plans, to families, children, seniors and individuals with complex medical needs. The Company serves approximately 3.8 million members nationwide as of June 30, 2015 . For more information about WellCare, please visit the Company's website at www.wellcare.com or view the company's videos at https://www.youtube.com/user/WellCareHealthPlan .
